title: Mixed Signal Integrated Circuits Design 2021
desc: This course covers fundamentals of data converters, Nyquist-rate converters ,central concept of oversampling and CMOS Image sensor design. This course is intended for those who seek to learn more about mixed-signal (analog plus digital) circuit design, analysis, and application. The course starts with sampling circuits, then building blocks for data converters - Opamps and Comparators, later the architecture of DACs and ADCs are covered.

content.title: Unit 1 | Lecture 1 | Mixed Signal Design Overview
content.shortDesc: This lecture covers the overview of Mixed Signal Design.

content.title: Unit 1 | Lecture 2 | Dynamic Analog Circuits
content.shortDesc: This lecture is an introduction to dynamic analog circuits - Sampling switches. It covers the ability of MOSFET to exchange the roles of source and drain via two examples.

content.title: Unit 1 | Lecture 3 | Sampling Switches - Speed Considerations
content.shortDesc: This lecture is about the speed considerations of a sampling switch, how to define speed of a sampling switch, factors affecting the switching speed and the resistance of NMOS switch, PMOS switch and Transmission Gate Switch.

content.title: Unit 1 | Lecture 4 | Sampling Switches - Precision considerations
content.shortDesc: This lecture is about the charge injection mechanism and its effects.

content.title: Unit 1 | Lecture 5 | Sampling Switches - Precision considerations contd
content.shortDesc: This lecture covers clock feedthrough/ capacitive feedthrough effects and KT/C noise.

content.title: Unit 1 | Lecture 6 | Techniques to resolve charge injection and clock feedthrough
content.shortDesc: This lecture covers charge injection and clock feedthrough/ capacitive feedthrough reduction techniques.

content.title: Unit 1 | Lecture 7 | Sampling Phase issues - Gate Boosted Switch Part 1
content.shortDesc: This lecture summarises the sampling phase issues and introduces Bootstrap switch.

content.title: Unit 1 | Lecture 8 | Gate Boosted Switch Part 2
content.shortDesc: This lecture covers Bootstrap switch and Nakagome Charge pump.

content.title: Unit 2 | Lecture 1 | Introduction to Switched Capacitor Circuits
content.shortDesc: This lecture covers the introduction to switched capacitor circuits.
